title: btctodamon
author: btctodamon
content: Every one get updates about asian games 2023 going to last stages OPENING CEREMONY23/09/2023CLOSING CEREMONY08/10/2023HOST CITYHangzhouCOUNTRYPeople's Republic of ChinaEVENTS482SPORTS40GAME NO19At recent news and games India's men's team defeated Japan 4-2 in hockey.Nishant Dev defeats Phuoc Tung Bui in boxing.IND 2-0 KSA in football; India exits Asian GamesIndia places last in the women's 4 Ã— 200-meter freestyle relay final in swimming.India placed sixth in the men's 4x100 m freestyle relay final in swimming.Boxing: Deepak exits the Asian Games after losing to Tomoya Tsuboi.Tennis: Bopanna/Bhosale advance to the semifinals of the mixed doubles eventSathiyan qualified for the men's singles R-16 in table tennis.Tennis: Saketh and Ramkumar go to the men's doubles finalsSharath Kamal qualifies for the Men's Singles R-16 in table tennis.India defeats Nepal in squash's Men's Team match 3-0.Horseback riding: Anush Agarwalla takes home a bronze in dressage.Updated Asian Sports Medal countSutirtha and Ayhika reach the Round of 16 in women's doubles in table tennis.ping pong:
